channel.title: Whats your Favourite Console Game?
channel.description:
Well without a doubt it a N64 game but I still cannot decided between Goldeneye and the original Perfect Dark.
Both games are Epic and have amazing Multiplayer modes. I prefer Perfect Darks multiplayer mode by an inch but Goldeneye is still a jug of fun. Additionally both games revolutionized console FPS and had good length story modes!
What's your favourite?

item.title: Whats your Favourite Console Game?
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

RUNESCAPE FTW!

Fuck that shit lol.
Favorite Console Game? I cant decide which is… But my favorites are:
Mortal Kombat 1,2 and Trilogy (Pure gore and 2d fighting.)
Street Fighters Alpha 3 (Fuck SF2, alpha had super arts!)
Double Dragons (Great for Co-op Play)
Capcom vs SNK (Greatest collab game of all time.)
King Of Fighters (A great 2d fighter.)
Doom 1, 2, 3 (Great classic fps.)
Super Smash Bros. (Epic moments.)
WWF No Mercy/Wrestlemania 2000 (Started the whole SMACKDOWN!/ SvR series.)

Read full topic

item.title: Whats your Favourite Console Game?
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

Time Splitter2

most epic fps ever.

I played 4 player splitscreen with my friends all the time. It was so customizable. You could chose the weapons that would spawn in the map. You could even make your own map with the built in mapmaker (which was epic).

Read full topic

item.title: Whats your Favourite Console Game?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:57, topic:261083”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=344755.msg2663376#msg2663376 date=1234380790]
ET the Extra terrestrial on atari!
[/quote]

That was the ultimate worst game of all time! I have it and to this day I have never figured out the point of it, the controls, what anything means or what you are supposed to do? [/quote]
its so pointless im suprised it even made it to release

item.title: Whats your Favourite Console Game?
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:36, topic:261083”]IMO anyone who thinks a controller is a real way to play an fps should watch some “pro” (ugh) FPS players on PC and then come back and say it again.

I am pretty much a console hater, especially this generation, so I am a little biased. But its still true.[/quote]

i play both pc and console…
consoles are great…
so are pcs…
eitherway neither is better or worse imo

fave of all time … perfect dark N64
glad ive seen very few people post HALO

also loved golden axe
and i actually liked zero wing quite a bit

item.title: Whats your Favourite Console Game?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Probably my favorite game would be Goldeneye, but another game I could play for hours on end was Jet Force Gemini on the N64, has anyone else ever heard of that game?

offtopic: I agree with Mopman, I can’t aim worth a shit with a joystick on a controller, a mouse is exponentially better. (the exception being doom-style aiming, left and right only ;D)

Read full topic

Last page people bitchin bout controller and mouse for PC, ultimately i find this: mouse is faster and controller is more accurate
[/quote]
I think mouse is faster and more accurate.[/quote]
hmm maybe its because i am alot less experienced with a mouse than a controller thats why i find it less accurate. But uno maybe it will come with time

I played Banjo Kazooie (N64) a long time ago and I really wasnt impressed! The concept of having a bird stuck onto a bear was pretty pathetic and the dancing carrots at the beginning were a bit wierd.[/quote]Definately the coolest platformer ever. You just didn’t play far enough to see it’s glory.

item.title: Whats your Favourite Console Game?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Chassy13:

Ahhh, I thought of another game series. The Mario Parties, I have every single one of them 1-8. I just really never play the ones on N64.

I like Mario Parties, wasting weekends with my family on the N64. Those game was all about the multiplayer

I remember liking Mario Party 2 alot cuz of the cool outfits on each level x)

If anyone remember the rafting mini games, I always got really sore in my hand from rotating the control stick so hard. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Whats your Favourite Console Game?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Niall:

Crash Team Racing(PS1) was pretty damned good

I remmeber that I could hardly beleive that they got that much gaming from a PS1. That is probably the only game that you actualy want to get 100% done.

I played Banjo Kazooie (N64) a long time ago and I really wasnt impressed! The concept of having a bird stuck onto a bear was pretty pathetic and the dancing carrots at the beginning were a bit wierd.

I’m suprised that Goldeneye fans dont like Perfect Dark. Has anyone actually played it?

Read full topic
